author: michele.mostarda
msg: The integration test has been refactored again.
The code has moved under the dedicated plugins/integration-test module.
The compile and dependency-copy logic has moved within the integration-test POM.
With the current configuration the integration tests are run during the integration-test Maven phase.
This commit is related to issue #171.

author: michele.mostarda
msg: Disabled plugin support to restore trunk build.
